title: What is the difference between Deezer and Spotify? - Quora

response.answer_text: Spotify blows Deezer out of the water. On some things…. Deezer can actually be quite good with some of their features but they’re not really competing with Spotify right now. Here’s why: Spotify has a better recommendation algorithm with their Discover Weekly, Release Radar, and Tastebreaker playlists.Spotify has better playlists like Colloborative playlists.Default dark mode is king.This video actually does proper justice in why Spotify could be better for you if you’re thinking about it:
